# Glenn Svanberg

> Personal portfolio and blog for Glenn Svanberg.

## Canonical site
- https://glennsvanberg.se/

## Main sections
- https://glennsvanberg.se/
- https://glennsvanberg.se/blog

## Crawl policy
- Allowed: /, /blog, /blog/*
- Do not crawl: /admin, /admin/*, /anotherPage

## Sitemap
- https://glennsvanberg.se/sitemap.xml

## Language
- Primary language: Swedish (sv-SE)
